# audioUnit

**Instance Property**

The audio unit associated with the generic view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var audioUnit: AudioUnit { get }
```

## Discussion

The audio unit associated with the generic view. On error, returns `nil`.
title: audioUnit
